poring_w02,105,198,4	script	Ana Maria	478,{

mes "[ Ana Maria ]";
mes "Olá "+strcharinfo(0)+"";
mes "O que deseja?";
switch(select("- Comprar Utilidades:- Comprar Flechas")){
	case 1:
		close2;
		callshop "Loja1",1;
		end;
	
	case 2:
		close2;
		callshop "Loja2",1;
		end;
		

}
}

-	shop	Loja1	-1,611:40,506:40,501:50,502:200,503:550,504:1200,525:500,601:60,602:300,1065:100,645:800,656:1500,657:3000,610:4000,514:200,533:300,521:400,522:8500,578:500,715:600,717:600,716:600,7521:150,7522:150,7523:150,7524:300,1750:1,1751:3,1756:3,1752:3,1755:3,1754:3,1771:50,713:6
-	shop	Loja2	-1,1750:1,1751:2,1752:3,1753:6,1754:3,1755:3,1756:3,1757:10,1758:30,1759:10,1760:10,1761:10,1762:3,1763:10,1764:30,1765:30,1767:3,1768:10,1769:30,1770:3,1772:3
